Name: Astro Joust
About the game: Astro Joust is an action multiplayer game about jousting with jetpacks! Inspired by the arcade classic! Grab your friends and get ready to Astro Joust! Features: Pick up and play gameplay! 2 to 4 Player Versus Mode! Single Player Wave Mode! Global Leaderboard! Five beautiful maps with varying obstacles and styles! A unique after-death mechanic to keep you playing even if you're knocked out of the match!
